$:/plugins/tg/layout/combination.text:
In case two or three of the following plugins: * Top menu ^^1^^ or Top-left menu ^^1^^ * Top toolbar ^^1^^ * Tiddlersbar ^^1^^ are to be combined, some adjustments to the layout are necessary to prevent overlapping parts. The following gives the general procedure. # Click the ''Adjust layout'' button {{$:/plugins/tg/layout/image/layout}} in the top right bar or click [[Plugin tweaks|$:/plugins/tg/layout/tweaks]] and select the Theme tweaks tab ## To create extra room on top, increase ''Story top position'' # Select the Layout tab and increase ''Height topbar'' # If required, adjust the 'Top' settings of
* 'Top menu' (tab Top menu, setting ''Top 'Top menu''') * 'Top-left menu' (tab Top-left menu, setting ''Top 'Top menu''' & setting ''Top 'Left menu''') * 'Toolbar' (tab Toolbar, setting ''Top 'Toolbar''') * 'Tiddlersbar (tab Tiddlersbar, setting ''Top 'Tiddlersbar''')
# Some tweaking of the above values # Adjust ''Sidebar top position'' in Theme tweaks tab until wiki title and tiddler title are level. ^^''1''^^ Available at http://tongerner.tiddlyspot.com/ <<< ''Note:''
http://tongerner.tiddlyspot.com/ shows the combination of 'Top menu', 'Toolbar' and 'Tiddlersbar'. <<<

$:/plugins/tg/layout/readme.text:
''Note:''
This plugin contains 'general' settings for the layout and is additionally required for my following plugins: ^^1^^ * Top menu * Top-left menu (top + left menu) * Toolbar (on top) * Tiddlersbar * ~TabStory (alternative tiddlersbar at top of story) * Uptoolbar (toolbar above title) * Tristate (tristate sidebar) This plugin contains layout code common to the mentioned plugins and let you adjust: !! Theme tweaks * Sidebar layout * Story left position * Story top position * Story right * Story width * Tiddler width * Sidebar top position * Sidebar width !! Layout tweaks * Display layout button ({{$:/plugins/tg/layout/image/layout}}) (checkbox) * Search above story (checkbox) * Toolbar to toggle editor toolbar + preview (checkbox) * Sort recent results alphabetical (checkbox) * Button to top of story river (checkbox) * Color and height of the top bar (as a boundary for top menu, toolbar, tiddlersbar, etc.) * Top padding of a tiddler * Color for displaying the 'active' state of some toggle buttons * Vertical position of 'sticky titles' * Vertical position 'sticky editor toolbar' Settings for the layout can be found in ''~ControlPanel > Appearance > [[Plugin tweaks|$:/plugins/tg/layout/tweaks]]'', also available via the 'Adjust layout' button ({{$:/plugins/tg/layout/image/layout}}) in the Toprightbar. |borderless|k |^^^1^^ |  |All these plugins contain a 'Settings' tiddler tagged with $:/tags/plugin-tweaks and will display - when installed - a tab under 'Plugin tweaks'.| <<< ''Note:''
@@color:red;A sticky editor toolbar works ''only'' well in non-preview mode!.@@ <<<
$:/plugins/tg/layout/readme.title: $:/plugins/tg/layout/readme
$:/plugins/tg/layout/readme.creator: TonGerner

$:/plugins/tg/layout/styles.text:
/* LAYOUT SETTINGS */

/* VERTICAL OFFSET FOR TOP OF SIDEBAR */
html .tc-sidebar-scrollable {
    top: {{$:/plugins/tg/layout/sidebar-top}};
}

* BACKGROUND COLOR TOPRIGHTBAR (with double chevron) */
.tc-topbar {
     background-color: {{!!topbar-background-color}};
}

/* TOPBAR */
.tgc-toolbar {
     display:block;
     position:fixed;
     left:0px;
     top:0px;
     width:100%;
     height: {{!!topbar-height}};
     background-color: {{!!topbar-background-color}};
     z-index: 600;
}

/* TOP PADDING TIDDLER */
body.tc-body .tc-tiddler-frame {
     padding-top: {{!!tiddler-padding-top}};
}

/* COLOR ACTIVE STATE TOGGLE BUTTON */
body.tc-body .tgc-active-indicator {
     color: {{!!active-state-color}};
}
body.tc-body .tgc-active-indicator svg {
     fill: {{!!active-state-color}};
}

body.tc-body .tgc-active-indicator:hover svg {
     fill: <>;
}

/* HIDE BUTTON2TOP WHEN NOT ACTIVE */
.tgc-fixed-bottom {
     display: none;
}

/* SETTINGS TABLE */
/* WIDTH SETTINGS TABLE */
input[type='text'].settings {
     width: 150px;
}
table.tablestyle {
     font-size: 0.9em;
     border-width: 0px;
     border-style: solid;
     padding: 2px;
     border-color: #DDD;
     border-collapse: collapse;
}
table.tablestyle th {
     background-color: #F0F0F0;
     border-color: #DDD;
     text-align: left;
     vertical-align: top;
     border-style: solid;
     border-width: 1px;
     padding: 5px;
}
table.tablestyle tr {
     background-color: #F0F0F0;
     padding: 0px;
}
table.tablestyle td {
     border-color: #DDD;
     border-style: solid;
     border-width: 1px;
     padding:2px;
}
/* COLOR HEADINGS TABLE */
.brown {
     color: #884411;
     font-weight: bold;
}
/* BORDERLESS TABLES */
.borderless, .borderless table, .borderless td, .borderless tr, .borderless th, .borderless tbody {
     border:0 !important;
     margin:0 !important;
     padding:0 !important;
}
